info.title: TimeTree

TimeTree API のカスタムコネクターになります。

get.description: Obtain information on users authorized by access tokens

parameters.name: include
parameters.x-ms-summary: Include related objects in the response. Only labels and members are supported. Include related objects in the response. Only creator, label, and attendee are supported.

get.description: Get a calendar information specified by calendar_id.

parameters.name: include
parameters.x-ms-summary: Include related objects in the response. Only labels and members are supported. Include related objects in the response. Only creator, label, and attendee are supported.

get.description: Get the label information used for the calendar appointments specified by calendar_id.
Get the information of users who are participating in the calendar specified by calendar_id.
Get the schedule information of the specified calendar from the day of the request.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specify the time zone. It is used in determining the all-day schedule. It does not affect the time zone of the response

parameters.name: days
parameters.x-ms-summary: Number of days to retrieve, can be in the range of 1 to 7. Default is 1

parameters.name: include
parameters.x-ms-summary: Include related objects in the response. Only creator, label, and attendee are supported.

get.description: Obtains the event information specified by calendar_id and event_id. イベントの取得

parameters.name: include
parameters.x-ms-summary: Include related objects in the response. Only creator, label, and attendee are supported.

delete.description: Delete an event from the calendar.

post.description: Add an event to the calendar
